vote.title: Authorize the second step of acquisition for condemnation by eminent domain to acquire an unimproved tract of land containing approximately 29,185 square feet, from Sorab Miraki, located on Morrell Avenue at its intersection with Sargent Road for the Dallas Floodway Extension Project - Not to exceed $129,724.00 ($126,724.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $3,000.00) - Financing: Flood Protection and Storm Drainage Facilities Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Funds)
